text: ohuta kiri dena men da, oba ohu kerehi biya vu vita ohuva gangata daman men da, tavada oba biya novanu tavada oba duk novanu yæyi da, niyata vasayenma api oba veta ohu nævata laba dennan vemu emenma api ohu dharma dutayin aturin keneku bavata pat karanno vemu yæyi da api musage mavata deva panivida danva sitiyemu
